Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits dry cleaning establishments from returning clothing to customers in single use garment bags, except upon request by a customer
Summary: Prohibits dry cleaning establishments from returning clothing to customers in single use garment bags, except upon request by a customer; allows dry cleaning establishments to return clothing to customers in reusable bags provided by such customers.
LawCode: Add ยง391-w, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the use of single use plastic garment bags by dry cleaning establishments
